item.description:
This Valentine's Day come enjoy a unique experience... a meditation to open the heart. This meditation will start in the standing position practicing simple Qi Gong exercises that allow the energy to flow through the meridians of our bodies. We will then bring the energy down to the earth in sitting meditation. Focusing on our middle Dan Tien also know as the heart chakra.

We will chant specific chants that correlate with the different meridians of the body. With the sounds of our voices the energy flows like a waterfall washing over us. Moving onto our backs we will be in a circle with our heads facing the middle. We will work with the medicine of the plants and trees using essences that open the heart. We will go into a deeper meditation coming into connection with our mother earth. We will become the midway point between heaven and earth. One with the universe and all of life we feel joy, abundance, and gratitude.

The meditation will be from 7-9 pm . Cost is $10. This event will follow the Valentine's Day Tantra Workshop.

Namaste
item.name: Heart Opening Qi Gong Meditation
